value.latex:
Résoudre sur ${\R^2} \setminus \{(0,0)\}$ : $x\frac{\partial f}{\partial x} = -y\frac{\partial f}{\partial y}$,
en posant $\begin{cases}x = \rho\cos\theta \cr y = \rho\sin\theta. \end{cases}$
value.html: Résoudre sur \({\R^2} \setminus \{(0,0)\}\) : \(x\frac{\partial f}{\partial x} = -y\frac{\partial f}{\partial y}\), en posant \(\begin{cases}x = \rho\cos\theta \cr y = \rho\sin\theta. \end{cases}\)
